markdownRemark.html:
Design and Analysis of Algorithms

Techniques for the analysis of algorithms, including counting, summation, recurrences, and asymptoic relations; techniques for the design of efficient algorithms, including greedy methods, divide and conquer, and dynamiic programming; examples of their application; an introduction to tractable and intractable problems.

Theory is when one understands everything but nothing works. Practiice is when everything works but nobody understands why.

Applications

  • Social networking
  • AI

frontmatter.title: Introduction: Design and Analysis of Algorithms
